name: Aliens (demo) (Raion Community)
description:
The game is still in demo. In this game, players are required to escape from aliens who are attacking the earth and have arrived at the office where Asep (the main character) works.

The goal of this game is to complete each level by escaping from one floor to another. If the player is hit twice by an alien, then the player will die/game over.

Made by:

  1. Khairian Fadhilah (designer)
  2. Muhammad Dajuma Fenori (programmer)
  3. Jonathan Tarandung (programmer)
  4. Muhammad Ghifari (artist)
